cast.overview: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.
cast.title: Suspiria

details.biography: Halla Thordardottir is an Icelandic dancer known for her role as Mascia in the film Suspiria (2018).  She has worked as a dancer in Iceland, Sweden and Italy with world renowned choreographers such as Damien Jalet (Suspiria, Les Medusées, Black Marrow) and Sasha Waltz (Körper).
details.name: Halla Thordardottir
